sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.ppm_teamspace_1" name="Project Management TeamSpace 1" version="1.0.0" cache_flush="true" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" type="application" help="" licensable="true" license_model="producer"> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.financial_planning_pmo" /> </requires> <description>Installs a Project TeamSpace so that each team or each department like Marketing, Finance, IT-Team1, IT-Team2 can implement PPM suitable to their needs without overstepping each other.</description> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Installs a Project TeamSpace so that each team or each department like Marketing, Finance, IT-Team1, IT-Team2 can implement PPM suitable to their needs without overstepping each other.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.snc.ppm_teamspace_1</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Project Management TeamSpace 1</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.ppm_teamspace_1/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.financial_planning_pmo</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.ppm_teamspace_1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
